languages.text: "Когда-то мы были знакомы. Он помог мне перебраться в Простор, обзавестись первыми связями. Но это — старая история, которую я предпочитаю не тревожить без нужды. Сейчас в моей жизни все хорошо, и я не нуждаюсь в Пощаде".

"We knew each other once. He helped me make the move to the Expanse and establish my first connections. But that's an old story I prefer not to poke at if I can help it. Things are good in my life now, and I don't need Mercy."
languages.original_text: "Когда-то мы были знакомы. Он помог мне перебраться в Простор, обзавестись первыми связями. Но это — старая история, которую я предпочитаю не тревожить без нужды. Сейчас в моей жизни все хорошо, и я не нуждаюсь в Пощаде".

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «En su momento nos conocimos. Me ayudó a mudarme a la Extensión y a establecer mis primeros contactos. Pero es una vieja historia que preferiría no reabrir si no hace falta. Las cosas me van bien y no necesito a Mercy».
languages.original_text: "We knew each other once. He helped me make the move to the Expanse and establish my first connections. But that's an old story I prefer not to poke at if I can help it. Things are good in my life now, and I don't need Mercy."

traits.locale_text: «En su momento nos conocimos. Me ayudó a mudarme a la Extensión y a establecer mis primeros contactos. Pero es una vieja historia que preferiría no reabrir si no hace falta. Las cosas me van bien y no necesito a Mercy».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我们是老相识了。他帮我搬到了科罗努斯扩区，帮我建立了我的第一个商业关系网，但那些都是陈年旧事了。如果可以的话，我不希望再提起这些事情。我现在过得很好，不需要悯慈帮忙。”
languages.original_text: "We knew each other once. He helped me make the move to the Expanse and establish my first connections. But that's an old story I prefer not to poke at if I can help it. Things are good in my life now, and I don't need Mercy."

traits.locale_text: “我们是老相识了。他帮我搬到了科罗努斯扩区，帮我建立了我的第一个商业关系网，但那些都是陈年旧事了。如果可以的话，我不希望再提起这些事情。我现在过得很好，不需要悯慈帮忙。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「昔の知り合いだよ。エクスパンスに引っ越したり、最初のコネを作ったりする時に手伝ってくれたんだ。でも、もう昔の話だ。あたしは今の人生に満足してる。マーシーはもう必要ないんだ」
languages.original_text: "We knew each other once. He helped me make the move to the Expanse and establish my first connections. But that's an old story I prefer not to poke at if I can help it. Things are good in my life now, and I don't need Mercy."

traits.locale_text: 「昔の知り合いだよ。エクスパンスに引っ越したり、最初のコネを作ったりする時に手伝ってくれたんだ。でも、もう昔の話だ。あたしは今の人生に満足してる。マーシーはもう必要ないんだ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Nous nous sommes connus dans une autre vie. Il m'a aidée à m'installer dans les Étendues et à y établir mes premiers contacts, mais c'est de l'histoire ancienne, et je préfère éviter autant que possible de ressasser le passé. Désormais, l'avenir me sourit et je n'ai plus besoin de lui. »
languages.original_text: "We knew each other once. He helped me make the move to the Expanse and establish my first connections. But that's an old story I prefer not to poke at if I can help it. Things are good in my life now, and I don't need Mercy."

traits.locale_text: « Nous nous sommes connus dans une autre vie. Il m'a aidée à m'installer dans les Étendues et à y établir mes premiers contacts, mais c'est de l'histoire ancienne, et je préfère éviter autant que possible de ressasser le passé. Désormais, l'avenir me sourit et je n'ai plus besoin de lui. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wir kannten einander einst. Er hat mir geholfen, in die Ausdehnung umzusiedeln und meine ersten Verbindungen zu knüpfen. Doch das ist eine alte Geschichte, die ich lieber nicht aufwärmen möchte, wenn es sich vermeiden lässt. Mein Leben ist gut, ich brauche Mercy nicht."
languages.original_text: "We knew each other once. He helped me make the move to the Expanse and establish my first connections. But that's an old story I prefer not to poke at if I can help it. Things are good in my life now, and I don't need Mercy."

traits.locale_text: "Wir kannten einander einst. Er hat mir geholfen, in die Ausdehnung umzusiedeln und meine ersten Verbindungen zu knüpfen. Doch das ist eine alte Geschichte, die ich lieber nicht aufwärmen möchte, wenn es sich vermeiden lässt. Mein Leben ist gut, ich brauche Mercy nicht."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "We knew each other once. He helped me make the move to the Expanse and establish my first connections. But that's an old story I prefer not to poke at if I can help it. Things are good in my life now, and I don't need Mercy."

languages.text: "Bir zamanlar birbirimizi tanırdık. Uzun zaman önce Enginlik'e yerleşmeme ve ilk bağlantılarımı kurmama yardım etmişti. Bu, eski ve zorunda kalmadıkça deşmeyi sevmediğim bir hikâyedir. Hayatım şu an yolunda gidiyor, Merhamet'e ihtiyacım yok."
languages.original_text: "We knew each other once. He helped me make the move to the Expanse and establish my first connections. But that's an old story I prefer not to poke at if I can help it. Things are good in my life now, and I don't need Mercy."

traits.locale_text: "Bir zamanlar birbirimizi tanıyorduk. Uzun zaman önce Enginlik'e yerleşmeme ve ilk bağlantılarımı kurmama yardım etmişti ama bu eski ve zorunda kalmadıkça deşmeyi sevmediğim bir hikâye. Hayatım şu an yolunda gidiyor ve Mercy'e ihtiyacım yok."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
